Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering
FOR HEARTS LONG LOST...: When Fatality uses Mystics team ability, after resolutions modify her attack and defense +1 until the end of your next turn.
NOTHING CRUELER THAN A LOVER SPURNED: Mind Control. When Fatality uses it, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to each target missed by Mind Control.
TASTE MY SPEAR: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Precision Strike, Giant Reach: 2.
